column4: I'm trying to record sound with ubuntu, but no matter which soft I use there's this wierd background sound....
How can i get rid of it
that is interference, that is natural
do u realy think it's normal? I dunno...
it is, if you are using analog instead of digital. what are you trying to record?
I don't understand what u mean
are you using a microphone with the plugin that looks like headphones?
and is the noice sorta like a static?
usb plugin? no, its probably analog, you plug it into your pc witha round connector that looks like a headphone jack
you need a usb headset, that will eliminate the static. analog almost always have static
thats all i can tell you.
